properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 29 at 1:43PM MST until March 1 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
...Winter Storm Watches Posted for Portions of Central and
Southern Wyoming late tonight through Sunday evening...

.Snow will develop late tonight and continue through the day
Sunday. The snow is likely to persist across southern Wyoming
Sunday evening. The combination of snow and wind could create
hazardous travel in some locations.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Wind River Mountains East.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult across South Pass due
to blowing snow reducing visibility. Cold Wind chills as low as
negative 20 in the mountains could cause frostbite on exposed
skin in as little as 30 minutes..
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST SUNDAY
